sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { BrowserRouter as Router, Routes, Route } from 'react-router-dom'; // Import your styles import './styles/globals.css'; // Simple components for now const SimpleHeader = () => (
Z

Zuree Telecom

Connected Solutions

Home About Services Contact Login
); const SimpleFooter = () => (

© 2024 Zuree Telecom. All rights reserved.

); // Page Components const Home = () => (
{/* Hero Section */}

Welcome to Zuree Telecom

Experience next-generation telecommunications with unmatched reliability, speed, and innovation. Connect your world with professional telecom solutions.

{/* Test Indicators */}
1M+
Happy Customers
99.9%
Network Uptime
24/7
Customer Support
50+
Cities Covered
{/* Features Section */}

Why Choose Zuree Telecom?

We deliver cutting-edge telecommunications solutions with unmatched reliability and customer support.

‚ö°

Lightning Fast

Experience blazing-fast speeds up to 1Gbps with our fiber-optic network.

üõ°Ô∏è

Secure & Reliable

99.9% uptime guarantee with enterprise-grade security protection.

üë•

Expert Support

24/7 technical support from certified professionals ready to help.

{/* Services Preview */}

Our Services

Comprehensive solutions for all your communication needs

üì±

Mobile Services

Unlimited data plans with 5G coverage nationwide

Starting at $39/month
üåê

Internet Plans

High-speed fiber internet for homes and businesses

Starting at $49/month
üíº

Business Solutions

Enterprise-grade telecommunications for companies

Custom Pricing
{/* Test Sections */}
‚úÖ React Router is working! This is the Home page.
üé® Tailwind CSS is working! This box should be blue.
); const About = () => (

About Zuree Telecom

For over a decade, we've been at the forefront of telecommunications innovation, connecting people and businesses with reliable, cutting-edge communication solutions.

Our Mission

To provide world-class telecommunications services that connect communities and enable digital transformation.

Our Vision

To be the most trusted telecommunications provider, enabling seamless connectivity worldwide.

); const Services = () => (

Our Services

üì±

Mobile Services

Comprehensive mobile plans with unlimited data and 5G coverage.

Starting at $39/month
üåê

Internet Plans

High-speed fiber internet with speeds up to 1Gbps for homes and businesses.

Starting at $49/month
üíº

Business Solutions

Enterprise-grade communication solutions designed for growing businesses.

Custom Pricing
); const Contact = () => (

Contact Us

Get in Touch

üìû +1 (555) 123-4567
‚úâÔ∏è info@zureetelecom.com
üìç 123 Telecom Ave, New York, NY 10001

Send us a Message

); const Login = () => (

Login

); const NotFound = () => (

404

Page Not Found

‚Üê Go back to homepage
); // Layout wrapper const Layout = ({ children }) => (
{children}
); function App() { return (
} /> } /> } /> } /> } /> } />
); } export default App;
